column4: i can boot into the livecd... if i make a disk image of the install cd, on a separate partition on the hard drive.. and then change grub to boot to that, i wonder if i can install from there
nah... cd roms are obsolete... not worth it.. plus my laptop is a pain in the ace to take a part
id rather be able to install over a network or from the hard drive... shouldn't be that tough... you can do this with most other distros
pxe boot? net install? which one are you referring to?
